sourcesContent:
<template>
  <canvas id="gobang" style="width: 800px;height: 600px"></canvas>
</template>

<script>
import {onMounted} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "chessboard",
  setup(){
    onMounted(()=>{
        // 画棋盘
      let container=document.getElementById("gobang");
      let ctx=container.getContext("2d");
      //ctx.translate(70,70);
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.fillStyle = "#fff";
        ctx.rect(0, 0, 450, 450);
        ctx.fill();
        for (var i = 0; i < 15; i++) {
          ctx.beginPath();
          ctx.strokeStyle = "#D6D1D1";
          ctx.moveTo(15 + i * 30, 15); //垂直方向画15根线，相距30px;
          ctx.lineTo(15 + i * 30, 435);
          ctx.stroke();
          ctx.moveTo(15, 15 + i * 30); //水平方向画15根线，相距30px;
          ctx.lineTo(435, 15 + i * 30);
          ctx.stroke();
          //resultArr.push(new Array(15).fill(0));
      }
    })
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
